name: Dungeon of hell
description:
After a large mudflow, a strange cave appeared, from where a terrible, incomprehensible sound came. A young speleologist decides to descend into this cave without assuming that he is waiting for him inside these catacombs. Making a descent into the cave, his rope suddenly breaks. He has to find another way out of this infernal labyrinth.

Key feature:

Catacombs
You need to be careful, you have to find the only door from this infernal cave that will lead you outside.

Tense atmosphere
Constant struggle with a sense of hunger and thirst, with terrible creatures and vampires. You completely immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the dungeon and survive that long time that this speleologist experienced.

Labyrinth
You need to remember the places passed by you earlier, so as not to get lost and find that very "door" (poke in all the doors).

Despite the small size of the game, it will bring you many hours of gameplay and will not make you bored, follow the blue arrow of the radar.
